ServiceInterface¶

class zserio.ServiceInterface[source]¶

Bases: object

Generic interface for all Zserio services.

Methods Summary

callMethod(methodName, requestData[, context])

Calls method with the given name synchronously.

Methods Documentation

callMethod(methodName, requestData, context=None)[source]¶

Calls method with the given name synchronously.

Parameters

  • methodName – Name of the service method to call.

  • requestData – Request data to be passed to the method.

  • context – Context specific for particular service.

Returns

Response data.

Raises

ServiceException – If the call fails.

Previous topic

ServiceException

Next topic

Array
